content:
All test cases have passed successfully. We are now ready to move to the Go-to-market phase. Go-to-market consists of the following documents:
Product Brief - a summary brief outlining the functionality in the release and aimed towards internal marketing teams
Release Notes - basic outline of contents of new release: outline of new functionality introduced and existing functionality fixed
Internal FAQs - answers to most common questions expected to be asked by internal staff regarding new release
External FAQs - answers to most common questions expected to be asked by customers regarding new release
User Documentation - instruction guide for customers on how to use new functionality
Newsletter Entry - short summary of functionality for customer newsletter
Internal Presentation - internal company presentation for sales, partnerships, marketing, customer success, customer support, implementation teams to provide high level summary and outline key features/benefits of new functionality being released
Create all of the Go-to-market documents for the Loyalty Platform release.
